scripts.analyze: node scripts/postInstall.js &&  npm run clean && tsc && webpack --json > out/stats.json && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer out/stats.json -p=8981
scripts.build: node scripts/postInstall.js && npm run clean && tsc && webpack --mode=production
scripts.build:dev: node scripts/postInstall.js &&  npm run clean && tsc && webpack
scripts.clean: rimraf out && rimraf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rimraf dist
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
